sentences.en: a power struggle between forces favoring and opposing change
sentences.cn: 赞成改革和反对改革的两股势力之间的权力斗争

sentences.en: Curiously, the struggle to survive has greatly improved her health.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，她拼命求生的抗争使得她的健康状况大有好转。

sentences.en: He grandly declared that "international politics is a struggle for power".
sentences.cn: 他一本正经地宣称“国际政治是一场权力之争”。

sentences.en: He praised her role in the struggle against apartheid.
sentences.cn: 他称赞了她在反种族隔离制的斗争中发挥的重要作用。

sentences.en: I greatly esteem your message in the midst of our hard struggle.
sentences.cn: 您在我们奋力抗争时发来的电文让我充满了敬意。

sentences.en: It had been an uphill struggle to achieve what she had wanted.
sentences.cn: 她历尽坎坷才达到目的。

sentences.en: It is only a hobby, not a life or death struggle.
sentences.cn: 这只是一项爱好，不需要拼死拼活地努力。

sentences.en: It's a constant struggle to try to keep them up to par.
sentences.cn: 要让他们达标，需要不断努力。

sentences.en: People struggle to get the best piece of land.
sentences.cn: 人们竞相争夺最好的土地。

sentences.en: The fish put up a spectacular 20 minute struggle before being netted.
sentences.cn: 那条鱼在被捕到网里之前整整挣扎了20分钟，真是不可思议。

sentences.en: The room bore all the signs of a violent struggle.
sentences.cn: 这个房间留有激烈打斗的痕迹。

sentences.en: The team has been struggling all season.
sentences.cn: 整个赛季球队都打得很艰难。

sentences.en: They had to struggle against all kinds of adversity.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不同各种困境斗争。

sentences.en: They struggled for possession of the gun.
This age-old struggle for control had led to untold bloody wars.
sentences.cn: 这场由来已久的对控制权的争夺已经引发了无数流血的战争。

sentences.en: Those who have lost their jobs struggle to pay their supermarket bills.
sentences.cn: 那些失业的人们想方设法以支付超市的账单。

sentences.en: We must take the initiative in the struggle to end the war.
sentences.cn: 为尽早结束战争，我们必须抢先行动。

sentences.en: While I struggle through life, she lands on her feet.
sentences.cn: 在我挣扎过活的时候，她却运气亨通。

sentences.en: Why should I struggle on to please my parents?
sentences.cn: 为什么我要强装笑颜取悦我的父母？

trans.tran_en: a long hard fight to get freedom, political rights etc

trans.tran_cn: 努力， 斗争， 挣扎
trans.tran_en: to be likely to fail, even though you are trying very hard

trans.tran_cn: 奋斗，艰难行进，斗争，辩论
trans.tran_en: to try extremely hard to achieve something, even though it is very difficult
